author: Carolina Dias
title: Já estava grávida quando foi para a guerra
text:
Ana Sofia Cardoso revelou, há uma semana, que está
grávida de seis meses. A jornalista da TVI e da CNN conseguiu esconder a gravidez mesmo junto dos colegas de estação. Mas o que a comunicadora não revelou é que já estava grávida quando foi cobrir a guerra em Israel.
Em outubro e novembro de 2023, já com dois meses de gestação, Ana Sofia Cardoso passou 15 dias na Faixa de Gaza, como enviada especial da TVI e da CNN. Ao longo das duas semanas que passou em Israel, a jornalista foi relatando online e em direto tudo o que foi vendo e relatos de locais. "Kibbutz Kissufim, a apenas 1,2km da Faixa de Gaza. Como é que passadas quase 4 semanas... O que é impossível de mostrar através das imagens ainda está tão vincado? O cheiro, as marcas do sofrimento, do pânico...", começou por escrever.
"Se aqui é assim, não quero nem pensar, nem imaginar... Como está a ser do outro da fronteira, na Faixa de Gaza. Infelizmente, nunca as imagens conseguem mostrar tudo o que os nossos olhos são capazes de ver", escreveu a 1 de novembro de 2023.
Ana Sofia Cardoso ainda não revelou o sexo do bebé, sendo que está previsto nascer na Primavera. A jornalista é ainda mãe de Lourenço, de quatro anos, fruto da relação com Tiago Begonha.
Texto: Carolina Marques Dias; Fotos: redes sociais

author: www.ETRealty.com
title: UK house prices rise for first time in eight months: Halifax, Real Estate News, ET RealEstate
text: File PhotoLONDON: British house prices rose in annual terms in December for the first time in eight months, data from mortgage lender Halifax showed on Friday, adding to signs of a stabilisation in the property market after a hit from higher borrowing costs. House prices were 1.7% higher than in December 2022 - when the market was hammered by the \"mini-budget\" crisis of former Prime Minister Liz Truss. In monthly terms, prices rose by 1.1% from November, Halifax said. Britain's housing market boomed during the COVID-19 pandemic before demand fell as the Bank of England pushed up interest rates to counter a surge in inflation across the economy. However, a fall in mortgage rates in recent weeks has prompted some buyers to return to the market. BoE data published on Thursday showed lenders approved the most mortgages in November since June. Kim Kinnaird, director at Halifax Mortgages, said December's price rise was probably driven mostly by a lack of properties on for sale but the fall in mortgage rates raised the possibility of increased confidence among buyers in early 2024. \"Our latest forecast suggests house prices could fall between -2% and -4% during the coming year, although, as with recent years, forecast uncertainty remains high given the current economic climate,\" Kinnaird said. Imogen Pattison, an economist with Capital Economics, said the full-year increase in prices was helped by a 1.4% monthly fall in December 2022, shortly after the mini-budget crisis hit bond markets and market interest rates soared. However, the recent fall in mortgage rates meant Capital now expected British house prices to rise by an annual 3% in the fourth quarter of 2024, compared with a previous forecast of a 1.5% fall, Pattison said. Last week, rival mortgage lender Nationwide - which uses a different methodology to Halifax - said its data showed a fall of 1.8% in house prices in the 12 months to December, the biggest drop over the course of a year since 2008.

author: 小浪财讯
title: 创业板综ETF万家（159541）跌0.97%，半日成交额1575.21万元|创业板综_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
6月19日，截止午间收盘，创业板综ETF万家（159541）跌0.97%，报1.124元，成交额1575.21万元。创业板综ETF万家（159541）重仓股方面， 宁德时代 截止午盘跌1.13%， 迈瑞医疗 跌1.30%， 东方财富 跌2.19%， 双林股份 涨10.06%， 汇川技术 跌0.05%， 蓝思科技 跌1.50%， 阳光电源 跌2.96%， 中际旭创 涨3.03%， 爱尔眼科 跌1.16%， 森远股份 跌1.55%。
创业板综ETF万家（159541）业绩比较基准为 创业板综合指数 收益率，管理人为万家基金管理有限公司，基金经理为杨坤，成立（2023-10-18）以来回报为13.49%，近一个月回报为1.29%。
